found it, doable with image editor
1. delete XBOX360TOC_xxx, leave XBOX360TOC.txt from folder DFGAME
2.from folder COOKEDXENON delete COALESCED_FRA.bin
3.copy COALESCED_int.binand rename it COALESCED_FRA.bin
4. save

Sound&menu are now in english.

screwed i think,the english fix is for jtag onli from what i can gather...

Now , take this magicISO.
https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5249187/MagicISO_Maker_5.5_Build_281_%28serial%29

There is serial for it also.

Now open the game .ISO file with magicISO , here is tutorial HOW TO EDIT FILES IN .ISO
http://www.magiciso.com/tutorials/miso-features.htm
After you have edited the files in there SAVE.

Files what you need to edit.

1. delete XBOX360TOC_xxx, leave XBOX360TOC.txt from folder DFGAME
2.from folder COOKEDXENON delete COALESCED_FRA.bin
3.copy COALESCED_int.binand rename it COALESCED_FRA.bin
4. save

Now burn it & play.
